action_output_list: The user wants to create a new event in Simple Calendar Pro. The first step is to open the app.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Simple Calendar Pro"}
The user wants to create a new event. The screen shows a "Create a new event" button.{"action_type": "click", "index": 22}
The user wants to set the title of the event. The "Title" field is clickable and editable.{"action_type": "click", "index": 13}

The user needs to input the title of the event, which is 'Meeting with John'. The 'Title' field is already selected, so I should input the text.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "Meeting with John", "index": 13}

The next step is to set the location of the event. The user wants to set the location to 'Conference Room A', so I should click on the "Location" field to input the location.{"action_type": "click", "index": 14}

The next step is to input the description of the event. The "Description" field is clickable and will allow the user to input the description.{"action_type": "click", "index": 16}
The next step is to input the description of the event. The "Description" field is clickable and will open a text field for input.{"action_type": "click", "index": 16}

The user has clicked on the "Description" field and the next step is to input the description "Discuss project progress" into the description field.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "Discuss project progress", "index": 16}

The user has finished inputting all the event details (title, location, description). The next step is to set the date and time of the event. Clicking on this will allow the user to change the date.{"action_type": "click", "index": 21}
